fields.headline: Corrections and clarifications
fields.bodyText: • We omitted to credit John Woodworth as the photographer of an image of bluebells in a forest, which appeared on the cover of Travel (21 March). • A fashion trends feature suggested readers “channel Princess Stardust and dress red-carpet ready”. The intended reference was to the My Little Pony character Princess Twilight Sparkle (Take five, 21 March, page 34, Weekend). • Other recently amended articles include: Coronavirus and volunteering: how can I help in the UK? What are your rights in coronavirus lockdown Britain? Why has the media ignored sexual assault and misbehaviour allegations against Biden? Georgia Covid-19 cases rise as Atlanta mayor warns hospitals are at capacity
